Class RelationshipQuery

java.lang.Object
org.wikirate4j.utils.queries.Query<RelationshipQuery>
org.wikirate4j.utils.queries.RelationshipQuery
public class RelationshipQuery extends Query<RelationshipQuery>
Class used to build a Relationship Answer Query

Vasiliki Gkatziaki
